channel.title: Help plz
channel.description:
I need some help please i cant get a server to run anymore i follow all the things it says to do but i cant get it to run. i was able to start one earler this morning but now i cant everytime i try to run one i get "`java is not recognized as an internal or external command,operable program or batch file. press any key to continue..."
i have this as the java "set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk.1.6.0\bin\java.exe"" which is my current java version.My complier works fine that was the thing i was tryign to fix in the first place i fixed that by downloaded lastest java now the server woulnt work im using pvpscape
this what i have in it
"@echo off title Compiling... color f0 echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo / \ echo / Now compiling server... \ echo / \ echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java
title PvpScape color f0 echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo / \ echo / Now starting server... \ echo / \ echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk.1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./Class; server pause"
can anybody fix my problem? [br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 10:25:31 PM[/size][hr]ill figuire it out my self then i guess

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @Owner_of_Java Owner of Java
item.description:
@Owner_of_Java wrote:

lol look at mod taroks

[quote=“lordslayer565, post:1, topic:42089”]I need some help please i cant get a server to run anymore i follow all the things it says to do but i cant get it to run. i was able to start one earler this morning but now i cant everytime i try to run one i get “`java is not recognized as an internal or external command,operable program or batch file.
press any key to continue…”

i have this as the java “set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk.1.6.0\bin\java.exe”” which is my current java version.My complier works fine that was the thing i was tryign to fix in the first place i fixed that by downloaded lastest java now the server woulnt work im using pvpscape

this what i have in it

"@echo off
title Compiling…
color f0
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now compiling server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java

title PvpScape
color f0
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now starting server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk.1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./Class; server
pause"

can anybody fix my problem?
[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 10:25:31 PM[/size][hr]ill figuire it out my self then i guess[/quote]

Read full topic
